module.title: Functions & Scope
module.description: Learn function declarations, arrow functions, and scope

lessons.title: Function Declarations & Expressions
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Functions are reusable blocks of code
- Declaration: `function greet() {}`
- Expression: `const greet = function() {}`
- Functions can take parameters and return values

---

# Functions in JavaScript

lessons.title: Arrow Functions
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Arrow syntax: `const fn = (params) => expression`
- Implicit return for single expressions
- No own `this` binding
- Preferred in modern JavaScript

---

# Arrow Functions

lessons.title: Scope & Closures
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Block scope: `let`/`const` are limited to their `{}` block
- Function scope: variables declared inside a function stay inside
- Closures: inner functions remember their outer scope
- Global scope: accessible everywhere (avoid polluting it)

---

# Scope & Closures

lessons.title: Higher-Order Functions
lessons.content:
# Essential to know
- Functions that take or return other functions
- `map`, `filter`, `reduce` are built-in higher-order functions
- Callbacks: functions passed as arguments
- Essential for functional programming in JS
